channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS V3 -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-22508|2024-08-03T03:14:55.254Z -- codesys%20v3 -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in multiple CODESYS V3 products allows an authenticated remote attacker to block consecutive logins of a specific type.
